title: Hextech keys
body: So I've been playing for 2 weeks straight now, about 5 or more games everyday, and I haven't got a single key fragments... and I've been wondering if this is a bug or something, i mean, the chance to get a key fragment isn't THAT low??

replies.body: It personally took me over 130 games before getting one then I got 5 total fragments today. Same with my friend who started playing with me on the same day. We went so many days I personally went about 2 weeks without getting a key fragment not sure about him. What's the percentage chance after each key? I feel like its common for the first ones to open some chests then it becomes rare all of a sudden. That's exactly what happened to me and another person. They mention a curve but not an exact figure estimate or anything. Just a curve doesn't tell you much.

They must be wins. They must be on a champion you own. The more keys you get in the time frame, the less you get them later. I don't know the time frame they have but let's say 2 weeks. If you earn your first 3 keys early on in the week, you will get them far less in the later half of the week.
But through out the weeks I've got some wins, even some Ss, still nothing. But isn't 2 weeks a bit long tho...
I don't know their actual time frame, so... it was just an example. Your ranking has nothing to do with keys, just chests.

Keep in mind that once you earn keys, your chances to earn further fragments get reduced in the future.  You can read more about this in our [Hextech Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233)!

I posted earlier about this: I feel like key fragment drop rates are fine, but there's no clarity on when they'll change to being harder to get (or then easier again).  I would LOVE a little time saying something like "You've earned 5 key fragments so far this month" so I know when that resets I can go ham on getting more again.
